The Ultimate Bill-Paying Solution.

Paysusofi is a secure and reliable platform that streamlines bill payments and provides you with a seamless experience, allowing you to easily pay your electricity bills, education bills, airtime top-ups, cable TV subscriptions, data bundle top-ups, and internet bills - all in one place.

Fast & secure bill payment solution, trusted by thousand of users

Experience the swiftest and most secure bill payment solution, earning the trust of thousands and helping them manage their finance on the go.

How It Works

Discover the simplicity of Paysusofi’s seamless process.

Sign Up in Minutes

Begin by signing up effortlessly. Complete the process in minutes, unlocking a world of convenient financial transactions.

Fund Your Account

Easily fund your Paysusofi account. Add funds with the payment method of your choice, ensuring your wallet is ready for transactions.

Choose Service

Select the service you need from a range of options. Whether it's making payments, converting airtime or more, Paysusofi has you covered.

Make Purchases

Proceed to make purchases seamlessly. Enjoy a swift and secure shopping experience with Paysusofi.

Security and Privacy

Your financial security is our top priority. Paysusofi employs advanced encryption to safeguard your transactions and ensure the utmost privacy.

24/7 Customer Support

Experience unparalleled customer support. Our dedicated team is available around the clock to assist you with any inquiries or concerns.

Trusted by a Growing Community

Join a community of over 500k satisfied users. Paysusofi is a trusted platform, chosen by individuals seeking reliable and efficient financial services.

Swift Payments with Virtual Cards

Transform your online shopping experience with Paysusofi’s secure virtual cards. Swiftly generate virtual cards within the app, adding an extra layer of security to your transactions. Link them seamlessly to your Paysusofi account for a hassle-free payment process. Enjoy the convenience of swift online purchases and receive real-time notifications, putting you in control of every transaction.

FAQs: Got Questions? We’ve Got Answers!

Have questions? Find answers to commonly asked queries about Paysusofi.
Contact Us
  • Is my information secure with Paysusofi?

    Yes, your personal and financial information is secure with Paysusofi. We use advanced encryption technologies to protect your data.

  • What services can I pay for using Paysusofi’s virtual card?

    Pay for data, airtime, cable subscriptions, electricity bills, and fund betting wallets seamlessly with Paysusofi’s virtual card.

  • How can I contact Paysusofi’s customer support?

    For assistance, visit “Contact Us” on the website. Reach us through live chat, email, or phone for prompt and helpful support.

  • How do I sign up for a Paysusofi account?

    Signing up for Paysusofi is easy! download our app, click “Sign Up,” and follow the quick registration process. Provide the required details, and you’ll be ready to enjoy our services in no time.

  • What services can I pay for using Paysusofi’s virtual card?

    Pay for data, airtime, cable subscriptions, electricity bills, and fund betting wallets seamlessly with Paysusofi’s virtual card.

  • How quickly do funds reflect in my Paysusofi wallet?

    Funds added to your wallet reflect instantly for swift transactions.

Paysusofi is a financial technology company, not a bank. All our partner banks and card service providers are duly licensed.
